# Nkanyezi Lamp MCP Server Setup Instructions

This project is a .NET Core MCP server for the Nkanyezi Lamp Exam-to-Video Production Engine.

## References
- MCP Protocol: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol
- SDK Documentation: [Refer to official MCP docs for C#/.NET Core setup]

## Project Structure
- Backend: .NET Core API
- Frontend: Admin dashboard (React/Blazor)
- Services: PDF upload, OCR, question extraction/matching, teaching script generation, slide/narration generation, video rendering, YouTube optimization

## Development Rules
- Use .NET Core for backend API
- Follow MCP server setup instructions for C#
- Update this file as you complete each step

## Checklist
- [ ] Scaffold .NET Core backend API
- [ ] Set up frontend admin dashboard
- [ ] Implement PDF upload and OCR engine
- [ ] Build question extraction and matching logic
- [ ] Develop teaching intelligence layer (AI script generation)
- [ ] Create slide deck and narration generator
- [ ] Integrate video rendering engine (FFmpeg/PowerPoint)
- [ ] Add export, preview, and regeneration features
- [ ] Implement YouTube optimization generator
- [ ] Set up database for uploads, scripts, and videos
- [ ] Test MVP workflow end-to-end

Update this file as you progress through the project.
